talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Overlord of Soul Gareth$
Have you come to offer souls to the mighty overlord of souls?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why are you in Saint Haven?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Overlord of Soul Gareth$
Hmph. You can see me yet you ask who I am. You're an interesting yet foolish chap. I'm the lord who rules over the wandering souls in the Monolith, the great Gareth, the Overlord of Souls!

$Overlord of Soul Gareth$
That is a stupid question. I rule over the souls. I can appear anywhere the souls can be found. Of course, I have no reason to tell you my real reason, that I'm here to make it more convenient for you to submit your offerings.
